name: Ghost Hunt (itch) (macaronTheKing)
description:
ghosts are coming in the night, you need to kill them with your cross shot gun!

WASD for movement

Left mouse click for shooting 

This is my first mini jam 117 game

Unfortunately unfinished demo work.  I will keep update it!
